title: Mondays With Mike: October 2014 Edition
teaser: It’s a busy time at Wisconsin Public Radio with our fall membership drive, upcoming election coverage and some on-air specials. In this month’s edition of Mondays with Mike, Joy Cardin and WPR’s head honcho, Mike Crane, discuss the latest on WPR programming and operations. They also reflect on the life of our colleague and friend, reporter Mike Simonson, who passed away last weekend.
